Class MiTema

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.LookAndFeel
javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeel
com.formdev.flatlaf.FlatLaf
com.formdev.flatlaf.FlatLightLaf
com.formdev.flatlaf.themes.FlatMacLightLaf
Design.MiTema
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MiTema extends com.formdev.flatlaf.themes.FlatMacLightLaf
Custom Look and Feel theme extending FlatMacLightLaf. This class defines a custom theme named "MiTema" which is based on FlatLaf's FlatMacLightLaf.
Author:
Henry
